text: Albert Glenn Barr OBEBirthday 2005 Honours List (19 March 1942 – 24 October 2017) was a Northern Irish politician. He was born in Derry, Northern Ireland. Barr was an activist of Ulster nationalism. For a time during the 1970s he straddled both Unionism and Loyalism due to simultaneously holding important positions in the Vanguard Progressive Unionist Party and the Ulster Defence Association. Barr died ￼at Altnagelvin hospital on 24 October 2017 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Northern Ireland politicians
title: Glenn Barr
